definitions.definition: An instruction to play gradually more loudly , denoted by a long, narrow angle with its apex on the left ( < ), by musicians called a hairpin .
A gradual increase of anything, especially to a dramatic climax .
examples: Their fighting rose in a fearsome crescendo .

definitions.definition: The climax of a gradual increase.
examples: Their arguing rose to a fearsome crescendo .

main_definition: ( music ) An instruction to play gradually more loudly , denoted by a long, narrow angle with its apex on the left ( < ), by musicians called a hairpin .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) A gradual increase of anything, especially to a dramatic climax .
( figuratively , nonstandard ) The climax of a gradual increase.
